text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Noguera | native_name = | native_name_lang = ca | settlement_type = Comarca | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Bandera de la Noguera.svg | flag_alt = | image_shield = Escudo de la Noguera.svg | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Localització de la Noguera.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Autonomous community | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = Lleida | seat_type = Capital | seat = Balaguer | parts_type = Municipalities | parts_style = list | p1 = Àger, Albesa, Algerri, Alòs de Balaguer, Artesa de Segre, Les Avellanes i Santa Linya, Balaguer, La Baronia de Rialb, Bellcaire d'Urgell, Bellmunt d'Urgell, Cabanabona, Camarasa, Castelló de Farfanya, Cubells, Foradada, Ivars de Noguera, Menàrguens, Montgai, Oliola, Os de Balaguer, Penelles, Ponts, Preixens, La Sentiu de Sió, Tiurana, Torrelameu, Térmens, Vallfogona de Balaguer, Vilanova de Meià, Vilanova de l'Aguda | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 1733.0 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 34744 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | blank_name_sec1 = Largest municipality | blank_info_sec1 = Balaguer | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Noguera (, ) is a comarca (county) in the Province of Lleida, Catalonia, Spain. It is the largest comarca and its area represents some 5,56% of Catalonia. Its capital is Balaguer. ==Municipalities== Populations are for 2001. *Àger - pop. 497 *Albesa - pop. 1,523 *Algerri - pop. 507 *Alòs de Balaguer - pop. 167 *Artesa de Segre - pop. 3,413 *Les Avellanes i Santa Linya - pop. 475 *Balaguer - pop. 14,068 *La Baronia de Rialb - pop. 285 *Bellcaire d'Urgell - pop. 1,215 *Bellmunt d'Urgell - pop. 232 *Cabanabona - pop. 96 *Camarasa - pop. 886 *Castelló de Farfanya - pop. 570 *Cubells - pop. 381 *Foradada - pop. 209 *Ivars de Noguera - pop. 340 *Menàrguens - pop. 830 *Montgai - pop. 819 *Oliola - pop. 283 *Os de Balaguer - pop. 822 *Penelles - pop. 538 *Ponts - pop. 2366 *Preixens - pop. 522 *La Sentiu de Sió - pop. 469 *Tiurana - pop. 30 *Torrelameu - pop. 578 *Térmens - pop. 1,394 *Vallfogona de Balaguer - pop. 1,511 *Vilanova de Meià - pop. 423 *Vilanova de l'Aguda - pop. 256 ==Other websites== *Official comarcal web site *Statistics from the Institut d'Estadística de Catalunya Category:Province of Lleida
